code:
---
title: MIP TP daemon
---
flowchart TB
    Start((Start))
    Init[Setup sockets, structures and accept connections]
    Timeouts[Check timeouts and disconnects]
    ReadyFd{Which fd?}
    RecvLower{Ack?}
    ReceiveData{Expected?}
    RecvUpper{Is in-flight full \nor first packet\n not yet acked?}
    ReceiveAck{NACK?}
    HandleNack{In-flight?}
    HandleAck{In-flight?}
    Retransmit1[Retransmit non-acked in-flight packets\n if holddown timer is expired]
    Retransmit2[Retransmit non-acked in-flight packets\n if holddown timer is expired]
    SendPacket[Send packet and send\n ready to upper]
    Enque[Add packet to queue]
    SendQueue1[Send packets from queue until in-flight is\n full, sending request for each send]
    SendQueue2[Send packets from queue until in-flight is\n full, sending request for each send]
    CummulativeAck[Remove all packets with seqno before\nNACK-no from in-flight]
    RemoveFirst[Remove first packet from in-flight]
    CorrectData[Send up, ACK]
    Store[Store in buffer, send ACK and NACK]
    SendAck[Send ack, ignore content]
    MarkAcked[Mark in-flight packet as acked]

    Start --> Init --> Poll --> Timeouts --> ReadyFd
    ReadyFd-- Mip daemon -->RecvLower
        RecvLower-- Yes --> ReceiveAck
            ReceiveAck-- Yes -->HandleNack
                HandleNack-- First in-flight --> Retransmit1 --> Poll
                HandleNack-- Other in-flight --> CummulativeAck --> Retransmit2 --> SendQueue1 --> Poll
                HandleNack-- Not in-flight --> Poll
            ReceiveAck-- No -->HandleAck
                HandleAck-- First --> RemoveFirst --> SendQueue2 --> Poll
                HandleAck-- In-flight --> MarkAcked --> Poll
                HandleAck-- Not in-flight --> Poll
        RecvLower-- No --> ReceiveData
            ReceiveData-- Yes -->CorrectData -->Poll
            ReceiveData-- In-window --> Store -->Poll
            ReceiveData-- Recent seqno -->SendAck -->Poll
    ReadyFd-- Upper -->RecvUpper
        RecvUpper-- Yes -->Enque --> Poll
        RecvUpper-- NO -->SendPacket --> Poll

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 (Start 和 Setup sockets, structures and accept connections 的逻辑。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 '(Start 和 Setup sockets, structures and accept connections'。
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 Check timeouts and disconnects 和 Which fd? 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Check timeouts and disconnects 和 Which fd?'，你看看合适吗？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 Ack? 和 Expected? 这一块。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Ack? 和 Expected?'，对吧？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 Is in-flight full \nor first packet\n not yet acked? 和 NACK? 的环节。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Is in-flight full \nor first packet\n not yet acked? 和 NACK?'？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 In-flight? 和 In-flight? 的逻辑。

嗯，这样看起来很清晰。

用户在这里会遇到 Retransmit non-acked in-flight packets\n if holddown timer is expired 和 Retransmit non-acked in-flight packets\n if holddown timer is expired 的分支。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'Retransmit non-acked in-flight packets\n if holddown timer is expired 和 Retransmit non-acked in-flight packets\n if holddown timer is expired'。
对的，就这样。

这里必须包含 Send packet and send\n ready to upper 和 Add packet to queue 这一块。

我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Send packets from queue until in-flight is\n full, sending request for each send 和 Send packets from queue until in-flight is\n full, sending request for each send'，你看看合适吗？
